thread.title: Yahoo Gets No I.R.S. Guidance on Alibaba Spinoff
thread.title_full: Yahoo Gets No I.R.S. Guidance on Alibaba Spinoff

author: VINDU GOEL
title: Yahoo Gets No I.R.S. Guidance on Alibaba Spinoff
text: Continue reading the main story Yahoo said on Tuesday that federal tax authorities had declined to rule in advance on whether the company’s proposed spinoff of its $23 billion stake in Alibaba would result in a huge tax bill for Yahoo and its shareholders. The decision by the Internal Revenue Service , which Yahoo received Sept. 2 but disclosed in a securities filing on Tuesday, could endanger the spinoff, which has been highly anticipated by the company’s shareholders. Yahoo’s core business of selling advertising has struggled for years, and analysts say that the value of its stake in Alibaba, China’s leading e-commerce company, accounts for most of its stock price. Yahoo shares fell about 3 percent in after-hours trading after the company disclosed the I.R.S. ruling.
